name: priority: CRITICAL
description: CAUSE: Production down, security issue ACTION: Fix immediately

name: priority: HIGH
description: CAUSE: Major functionality broken ACTION: Address ASAP

name: priority: MEDIUM
description: CAUSE: Standard bugs/improvements ACTION: Normal flow

name: priority: LOW
description: CAUSE: Minor issues, UI polish ACTION: When time allows

name: priority: REVISIT
description: CAUSE: Valid idea with no timeline ACTION: Revisit later

name: status: DUPLICATE

description: Further details are required before work can begin

name: status: WONTFIX
